Name: Cyclone
About the game: Cyclone is a puzzling first-person action-platformer from the creator of the hit Portal modification, Blue Portals. Solve a series of perplexing puzzles by placing gravity-bending vortexes in the world. Launch objects, redirect projectiles, and fling yourself across the room to reach the exit! Features 12 levels, filled with mind-bending puzzles. A myriad of mechanics to play with! Hunt down the secret radios - each one with a unique tune composed by Swaggy Squirrel!
